item.description: What is a Design Pattern? Is a proven solution to a common problem What is the problem? Software References

item.title: MVC
item.description: MVC MVC is an acronym for Model, View and Controller which is a Design Pattern that allows you to create [[Scalable apps]], for this reason Big companies like Apple uses it.

item.title: Singleton
item.description: [[Zettelkasten/Design Pattern]] Singleton The singleton pattern is part of the [[SOLID]] standard and it means that only one instance of a class should be created and used across the app
